title: NAPPYWOOD 365
desc: NAPPYWOOD 365 A series of Natural lifestyle events for people of all ages, with a love for natural textured hair and community empowerment. ?Our Monday classes are for professional stylist, students and ?serious naturallistas or individuals considering working in the Natural hair or wellness. OCTOBER: Black women's health; more facts on Breast cancer and Hair Discussion: Alopecia, thining hair, How to restore the hair and the edges NOVEMBER: Creating a finance strategy & tips for the holidays. ?Hair Discussion:Growing your hair with Protective styles DECEMBER: Fun holiday hair styling techniques, Promote ?the community artists & entreprenuers.
